alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 15 at 3:17PM EDT until March 16 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia and southeast South Carolina. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper
